This island is famous for cattle and there are about 3000 cows in this island in spite of the fact that there are only 200 people. Bicycles can be rented at the port.

value: (西の浜), just west of the port, isn't much in the way of a beach, but it's a spawning ground for sea turtles during summer nights. The turtles are a protected species, of course, so viewing them is possible only under strictly regulated conditions.

studies mostly sea turtles, and plenty of juvenile specimens can be viewed in tanks. There's also a fearsome coconut crab in a cage, as well as coral and shells on display. Entry is ¥300. Nighttime excursions to view the sea turtles are available for ¥1500.
(仲本海岸) doesn't have turtles, but the reef is a pretty good snorkeling spot.
